book.title: Captain Bayley's Heir: A Tale of the Gold Fields of California
book.description: 简介： CRIPPLE boy was sitting in a box on four low wheels, in a little room in a small street in Westminster; his age was some fifteen or sixteen years; his face was clear-cut and intelligent, and was altogether free from the expression either of disconten...
